Title: 42002 - Never Let Your Smartphone Battery Die Again
Direction: 500 words. Make a list of three to six things people can do to extend the lives of their smartphone batteries. You may write about things like changing the settings on phones to use less power, using apps to monitor energy use, turning off vibrate, etc. You can include the client's keyword phrase and URL by mentioning Android Headlines as a good place to keep up with the latest tech energy-saving strategies. Make sure you only mention apps and settings that apply to Android devices. Your target audience is interested in information about Android devices.
